1153322222222221121.content: "Dammit!" you yell as you pass the tree you cut marks into for the fifth time. "Thats it, I'm lost" you grumble as you lean against the tree and slide to the ground. You had been wandering through the forest for most of the day. You and a couple of buddies were out camping, and you had gotten separated from the group during a hike. Fortunatly, you had some survival gear with you. In your backpack there was a survival knife, beef jerky, a roll of duct tape, and a first aid kit. You rest for a while munching on a strip of jerky. "What should I do?" you wonder out loud. "Guess I should keep walking." But before you get up a wierd light appears on the ground in front of you. It expands untill it's about eight feet in diameter. Thouroughly freaked out you were about to run when...
1153322222222221121.title: Feral

11533222222222211211.content:
A figure started to form in the light you quickly ran around the tree behind you and jumped into a bush popping your head out to see what was gonna come out. As the light faded you looked to see... A cat... ON TWO LEGS!? The cat had purple fur coming from the tips of it's ears, a white and purple striped tail, and... Yellow gloves with big claws coming out of them. The cat's back was facing you so it probably wouldn't notice you, it looked around and... Said? "What the... Ugh I knew I shouldn't have stayed that long Myotismon should be waiting... for... me... Whats that smell?" The cat started sniffing around for... 'Aw man the jerky!' You thought looking at the bitten piece of beef jerky in your hand. 'Uh What do I... I know' You thought slowly sliding the jerky under the bush, and next to the tree careful not to let the strange cat notice you then quickly moving your hand back making slight noise. "Hm?" The cat said turning around, you got to see that the eyes of the cat were blue and looked a bit feminine, and so did the voice. She looked down at the jerky out of curiosity then noticed the five marks you made on the tree. "Strange..." She said looking at the marks then at the jerky. 'Wait that's a cat can't she get my scent once she get's close enough.' You thought panicking which didn't help since you started sweating, also much to your dismay she started walking closer to the jerky she got down and took a few sniffs at it. "I suppose I'm a little hungry..." She said slowly licking it, you knew once the jerky was done she might be able to smell your scent. She then picked up the jerky and dropped it into her mouth, then slowly licking her lips she looked around. "Hm that was good is there more?" She said looking around while sniffing the air. You had some more in your bag luckily they were wrapped in plastic but... "Hm what's that smell?" 'That must be me!!' you thought panicking again.

But was it you?
11533222222222211211.title: The White creature

choices: Admit defeat... Walk out the bush...
SCREW IT!!! RUN FOR IT AND DON'T LOOK BACK!!!
115332222222222112111.content:
"Ugh more..." She said aggravated. 'more?' You thought just then she walked over and hide behind the tree, just then two guys came running over looking around... Hey wait a minute you know those people! "Ugh where is he" "Hey look over here." One of the guys from camp said walking over to the tree you marked, at this the cat tensed up and slide her claws into the tree. 'Oh no!' You thought is she gonna attack? "These marks this one looks new." The guy said looking at the one you last made. "Yeah he must be close by. Let's keep going." "Yeah." After that they ran off, and the cat calmed down. She walked to the front of the tree and looked at the mark. "Hm a little human strayed and got lost. Heh I want to find him first... Myotismon can wait..." She said with a slick smile 'Find... Me... f-first...' You started to worry sure she was a small little cat but still, common sense said whatever come from a burst of light is either strong and good, or strong and evil, She doesn't look or act good at all she then sniffed the floor where you sat at. "There we go." She got your scent! You really wanted to run so you took a step back *SNAP* 'That's getting old' You thought. "Hey! Come out or do I have to drag you out?" You heard the cat say.

What do you do...
115332222222222112111.title: Nope Distractions

1153322222222221121112.content: You didn't want to get lost, but you really didn't want to die! Getting ready to run you placed one foot next to the tree trunk and pushed as hard as you could. You launched forward, sprinting as hard as you could, however you don't get thirty feet before something hits you in the head. You black out for a moment and when your vision returns you see the cat thing standing in front of you with a smirk. "Gotcha" she said leaning down to your face you try to run but youre still dizzy from the hit and fall over. "fuck!" you groan holding your head "Oooh good idea!" you look up to see the cat in front of you. From where you were laying you had a clear view of the cats moist love hole, which made you hard immediately. She took a step forwards and you crawled backwards inadvertently exposing your tented pants to her. "Someone's excited! What's your name big boy?"
1153322222222221121112.title: SCREW IT!!! RUN FOR IT AND DON'T LOOK BACK!!!

choices: Stay and use the survival knife.
Wait until she's not looking and sneak away.
11533222222222211211122.content:
"Eh yeah... My mom said not to give my name off to strangers or strange looking cats." You said crawling back a little. "Strange Cats?" She questioned as she took another step. "You really think that's funny don't you?" She continued saying with a frown. "Eh... I'd rather not say..." You said stepping back a little more as you started thinking about what to do your head pulsed in pain with each move you made. 'I have to do something fast!' You thought still dizzy. You weren't faster then her you experienced that firsthand, but maybe you can outsmart her she did look a little unfocused it seemed like she was smelling something again, but didn't want you to notice. 'Wait the jerky!' You thought with a smile. "What! Got another wise crack for me to hear?" She said taking a few more steps. "Eh no just... Hang on!" You said taking your bag off, which made her give you a questioning look. She knew nothing you could do would hurt her so she let you do it. You looked and saw the jerky you also had that survival knife in your pocket, but compared to them claws you'd rather save that for later you pulled out the jerky and slowly placed it on the floor, this made her eyes widen. "T-that stuff!" "Yeah here." You said backing away she slowly walked over to the jerky, as soon as she got right in front of the jerky she glared at you suspiciously you raised your hands up with a smile to show you had nothing. This made her smile. "Humph So cute... Just wait right there as soon as I'm done I'll find out that name and then we can get on to the fun." She said with a soft purr as she bent down to pick the jerky up. 'This is gonna be a risk but I have to survive...' You thought your plan was going on perfectly, now this is a stretch if you failed you get raped by a cat, now if you succeeded you'll get away... But she'll eventually find you she does have your scent might even find out where you live...

What do you do...
11533222222222211211122.title: Um Yeah...

115332222222222112111222.content:
You waited for her to turn around which is taking longer then you want it to she kept eying you seductively eating very slowly. 'Yep I really have to make this work...' you thought as you smiled nervously playing along with her, just then both of you started hearing footsteps coming from the area you where you marked the tree the cat then turned around to look through the bushes that was probably your friends still looking for you... They gave you the perfect chance time to run even if she caught you ya still got that good ol' survival knife on ya. 'Time to make this Count!' You said turning around to get up and run as fast as you can you sprinted, a few seconds passed, 'Why didn't I get hit yet?' You thought looking back she was still looking through the bushes. 'Did she even notice me?' You thought looking forward to run faster...

Does she notice?
115332222222222112111222.title: Let the plan unfold.

1153322222222221121112221.content: You sprint as quietly as you can, not caring where you end up as long as its away from Gatomon. In the back of your mind you know she'll find you eventually, but you force yourself to ignore that for the time being. Sneaking a peek behind you, you realize Gatomon has disappeared. " Aww shit" you groan, recognizing the scenario. She vanishes, only to appear in front of you. True to form you feel a heavy blow to your stomach which forces all the air from your body and knocks you to the ground. " Ah ah ah" she admonishes " you can't leave we haven't had any fun yet!" as she approaches you draw the knife but it is swiftly kicked from your hand, leaving you utterly helpless against the seductive cat. " you shouldn't play with knives, you might cut yourself!" to prevent any more trouble Gatomon sits on your chest and pulls out the bag of jerky. " want a strip?" she asks. Slowly you nod your head. Smiling she placed a strip of jerky half way into her mouth and leans toward you. You turn your head not wanting a kiss from the cat. However she grabs your head and forces your heads together. After she bites the jerky in two she pulls away leaving half the strip in your mouth you eat it being slightly hungry from trying to escape. " That wasnt so bad now was it?"
1153322222222221121112221.title: Yup *Wham*

choices: I'd rather not get punched again
11533222222222211211122211.content: You wanted to straight up say 'Yes! You overgrown Cat!' but didn't for fear of your life. You look up at her kinda annoyed that she's sitting on you your arms aren't even tied you then look at your hands they're free and you can't even do anything not only that but she's eating all of your jerky right in your face. "Hm... Your a little quiet... I bet you have a sweet voice." said the seductive cat said licking your face she wanted you to talk just like she wanted you to run. 'She better not be able to read my mind!' You thought blushing at the small seductive licks given from the cat you then looked at the bag of jerky you packed alot how many did she eat? You then noticed your bag is off into the distance she noticed you looking at it "Heh that's yours right... Do you want it?" She said smiling innocently at you. You slowly nod your head, she then got up? And walked to go get it? She's obviously baiting you, wanted you to run she even stopped to look inside probably to see if you had more food, and to take any weapon out of it. You don't know whether she wants you to run or not but do you take this chance?

115332222222222112111222111.content:
You leap to your feet and dash in a random direction while keeping an eye on the psychotic cat once again she dashes at you preparing another strike. However, this time you were prepared enough to catch her arm and toss her away.

"Hey you're learning!" she cheers as you put some more distance between you. 'maybe if I can get to a body of water' you think to yourself. Ducking under a surprise jump-kick from Gatomon, you sprint as hard as you can towards your bag. Scooping it up you dash through the trees.

You manage to get a surprising distance before Gatomon leaps out of a tree in front of you, landing on your chest. "You're really cute when you struggle" Gatomon whispered into your ear "but no more, I'm getting tired of chasing you and I won't wait any longer." true to her word she wastes no time in removing your shirt with her claws.

"Well big boy, gonna tell me your name now?" against your better judgement you shout "Fuck you!" she smiles and yanks out your belt "that's the whole point!" you try to kick her away but she catches your leg with a single paw and strikes three points on your calf removing all feeling. "Pressure points" she giggled as you stare in shock.

'shit' you were immobilized, on the ground, half-naked, with a horny cat trying to rape you. 'This isn't going to end well.'

11533222222222211211122222.content: "What the fuck is your problem!" you scream at her now completely terrified. "What's wrong? Don't you like me?" "No you fucking stalker!" you had slowly been approaching your door, however she noticed and had you pinned to the ground before you try to run. "Let me go!" "Hmm" she mused pretending to think it over "No" she said with a smile. Grasping your wrist she tied both of your arms together, and then your legs. Before you could scream any more she removed one of her gloves and shoved it in your mouth. "There" she grinned evilly "Now you can't escape again" "Mphh!" she snickered at your helplessness, and extended her claws. Seeing this your edges widen in fear as she raises her paw and swipes at you several times. You close your eyes, expecting pain but to your surprise none comes. 1153322222222221121112222211.content:
"Gosune? Is that you sweetie" 'Mom!' "Damn" Gatomon growls "I'll be back for you" she whispers sweetly. Taking one slash with her claws she removes the bindings from your arms, before she leaps out your window and vanishes into the night.

"Yeah mom it's me" you say while pulling on some pants. You decide to keep quiet about Gatomon. Nobody would believe you.

"what happened to your wrists?" she said seeing the rope burns. "douchebag friends" you tell her. "They decided it would be fun to tie me up for a few hours." "Honey, you know thats dangerous! What if you had lost blood flow to your hands? You could have lost them!" "I know I know, I'll be more careful." apparently reassured she begins to leave. "Well get to bed Gosune it's late" "Alright mom" she leaves and you get into a pair of shorts, before closing and locking the window. You pull the blinds down over it and turn out the lights.

Once in bed, your mind began to keep you awake with the fear of Gatomon.

Allowing your paranoia to get the better of you you grab a large knife off it's display stand, and hide it beneath your pillow. "I'm so screwed"

choices: She holds back for a while
11533222222222211211122222111.content:
You jolt awake as a paw covers your mouth. You nearly faint when you see Gatomon above you. "Mpffff" you groan through her paw the sight of her smiling face made you try to strangle her only to find that your hands had been re-tied.

"Now. Where we're we?" she said seductively. "Ah yes you were about to get me off" positioning herself above your head she opens her moist vent with her fingers. "You ready?" you shake your head violently, which seems to egg her on. "heh heh heh here I come!" lowering her crotch to your face she moans as your lips come into contact with hers.

The immediate pleasure of contact was soon lost and Gatomon became impatient for you to start. "well come on start! Start or else!" Hesitantly you stick out your tongue. "Aaaahhh" Gatomon moans at the sudden stimulation. "D-Don't stop!" she ordered,and despite the circumstances you began to grow aroused as well.

Seeing your growing tent, Gatomon groaned "somebodys exited" deciding that enough was enough you continue your assault of her nether regions with a new vigor.
11533222222222211211122222111.title: Midnight visit

choices: Tell her youre not feeling too well.
115332222222222112111222221111.content:
The longer you linked her sensitive spot, the more tense she became. This effort was leaving a nasty-ass taste in your mouth, but seeing as though you didnt wanna be scratched by claws as big as hers, you did what you had to do and hoped that she'd climax soon and get this godawful night over with!

"Ooh! Ooh! OOH! OOOH!!!!" Gatomon was running her razor sharp claws against the carpet and gritting her teeth as she moaned, "Deeper! Deeper! Stick in it DEEP!" She grabbed the back of your head and pulled it closed against her digi-cooch, forcing your tongue even deeper into that nasty pit! You were almost starting to gag from the intense smell of sex and wet fur wafting in your nostrils!
"Erggh! Eeegh!! Eeeeegghh!!" she was hissing in raw excitement as she rolled her eyes back, "gonna.... geee....ggeeeeeEEE!!!"

"GRAGGHH!!" you jerked your head back as warm sticky liquid sprayed in your face! You coughed and wiped that stuff off, realizing way too late what just happened! If you had to guess, she just came! She came right in your face! Unlike her, you just couldnt swallow that stuff! Talk about humiliating.

Gatomon gasped and sighed, "...Wow. I havent felt one of those in a LONG time!" she looked down at you and grinned, "that wasnt bad, little guy. I think I'm starting to like you."
You were too busy holding down your lunch to curse at her. Whatever sense of manly pride you had left was stomped down by this cute little talking cat! You might as well just pray that God strikes you down now, cuz it cant get any lower than this... and if it can, you'd rather just die before it happens!

"!!" suddenly, Gatomon jerked her head upwards in surprise! Her expression of mocking cockiness suddenly changed to caution as she gazed toward the direction of your window!

"Aw, you gotta be kidding me!" she muttered in anger, "son of a bi... grrr!" What did she see?
Whatever it was, she suddenly hopped off your body and dashed toward the window! At this point, you didnt care what it was she saw! Just as long as she off your face and hopefully out of your hair. And hopefully out of your life!

But before she was about to leap out the window, she turned her head back to you and STILL gave you that cat-like grin you were getting sick of seeing!

"Sorry, love! Guess we're gonna have to cut our fun short tonight!" Gatomon said, "...but dont think I'm done with you yet. I'm looking forward to humping your brains out next time! ...Maybe if youre lucky, I can introduce you to the OTHER me!"
"O...ther... you?" you muttered questionably.
Gatomon just smiled and blew you a kiss, before finally hopping out the window!

When you finally thought she fled far enough, you spit a couple of times trying to get that awful taste out of your mouth. You had to rush to the bathroom and wash your mouth out over the sink! Finally, after the nasty taste subsided, the aching shame of being violated by that little furry stalker comes back with a vengeance. Worse even, she said she STILL isnt done with you! Why'd it have to be YOU of all people?!

"...'Other me'?" you were still hooked on those words she said, "what did she mean by that?" You hoped you wouldnt have to find out, but you aint that lucky. She was able to find out where you live for crying out loud! Does she have your scent memorized or something?!
With the thought of her lingering in your mind, it was next to impossible to go back to sleep. So for the entire night until the sun came up, you just stared up at the ceiling and thought. You thought about Gatomon, and the humiliation, and the humiliation that'd be to come, and what you could possibly do to prevent it... and the 'other her'.

*Bzzt Bzzt Bzzt* Your alarm clock went off. You hit the button to stop it and groaned. You were tired, achy, and groggy, but you could not sleep. How in God's name could one little adorable talking cat cause someone so much agony?! And to think, you used to love cats. Now, you'll probably be traumatized whenever you see a cat cross your path.

"GOSUNE!! Get up!" you hear your mom's voice call out to you, "your friends are here!"

Oh crap. You almost forgot. Today you and your pals are supposed to go to the beach. If it were any other day, you'd be so ecstatic to go to the beach that you'd hop out of bed and charge downstairs like a Myotismon out of Hell! But not today. What if SHE's still out there? You know she hasnt forgotten you. You dare not set foot outside and risk the next Rape of the Day.
Then again, would just staying behind keeping cooped up in the house all day be any better? Maybe if you nail down the windows and lock the doors tight, but...
...At least with your friends, you'd have strength in numbers. She cant attack ALL of you, right?!

"Gosune! Didnt you hear me?! Get up!"
115332222222222112111222221111.title: This concludes our... Rape of the Day™!

1153322222222221121112222211111.content:
You decide to at least try to have fun, but no way in hell are you going anywhere unarmed!

"I'm up!" you shout back rolling off your bed. "Where did I put them?" you mutter quietly. Throwing some spare clothes into a bag, you search frantically for the throwing knives you bought awhile back. "Ha found 'em"

You felt better going outside with them, even if you knew in the back of your mind they wouldn't do much.

You clatter down the stairs in swim trunks and a pair of sandals. Your friends were standing in the doorway dressed similarly.

"Yo Gosune what took ya'?" Mike threw his hands up "We been waiting for ya" tan skin and short black hair, Mike was the oldest of us all.

"Yeah what were you doing? Or should I say who?" with his crooked smile and spiky blonde hair came Greg, ever the obnoxious pervert,

"Oh go shove it up your ass Greg." Lillith jabbed him in the gut. An extremely violent redhead she was always beating on Greg

"You ready?"
1153322222222221121112222211111.title: Go downstairs...

11533222222222211211122222111111.content:
The four of you pile into Marks' car, and you're off. Throughout the drive you can't help but think about that cat. You know she can hunt you down and beat you in a fight, you just hope she'll avoid the water.

When you got to the beach, you found that it was rather empty, allowing you to choose whatever spot you liked and set up your towels. Despite the bright sun and your friends you couldn't relax, always looking about for the cat, never with your hand far from your hidden knives.

Does gatomon appear?
11533222222222211211122222111111.title: Yeah

115332222222222112112.content: The strange cat looked around sniffing the air until its gaze focused on the tree you were hiding behind. You peeked around the tree to see that the cat had dissappeared you slump against the tree relieved that it hadn't found you. You leaned back against the tree and opened your eyesto see the cat right in front of you. "Shi-" before the profanity could fully leave your mouth, it's gloved paw muted you. "Quiet" she growled. "Who are-? Th-that smell, you have that dried meat stuff. " In an instant she changed from a dangerous beast to a cute little kitten. You slowly reached into your back pocket and pulled out your pack of beef jerky. She quickly ripped open the package and devoured the jerky releasing your face in the process. "What are you?" " I'm gatomon!" she huffed, a little offended. "And you are a human, correct?" "Yes I'm a human" "Then you have a house?" she queried seeming a little nervous. "Yes I have a house." you were more then a little confused at this point, and weren't quite sure you wanted to know where she was going with all these questions. "Then could I maybe stay with you while I'm in this world?" This took you completely by surprise. You were expecting something like a request for more jerky. "Umm sure, I guess you can stay with me for a while" surprising you even more she jumped forward and grasped you in a tight hug. "Thankyouthankyouthankyou!" she even began to purr as she held herself to your chest. "If you let me up I could take you there" you suggest after a moment of sitting. "Oh right" she mumbled releasing you with a blush that showed even through her fur. You notice the blush as you get up. "Alright let's get going" as you began walking Gatomon jumped onto your shoulders. "Fine you can ride me if you want" "Ooooh that sounds like fun" she said suductively grinding her hips against the back of your neck. "That's not what I meant!" you exclaim "Aww you mean you don't want to fuck me?" "I didn't mean that either!" "So you DO want to sleep with me" " I DIDN'T SAY THAT!" you scream "Relax I was only kidding" she chuckled "Your going to be trouble, aren't you?" "Me, trouble? Never!" "Great" you grunt, matching her sarcasm.

info.brief_description: Choose a partner for Gatomon and go wild
info.description:
Choose a partner/s and have Gatomon fuck them senseless or maybe you prefer Gatomon get fucked?
1. Don't kill any character/s
2. No guy/guy stories.
3. Try and make the chapters long

You can write anything, but try to kept it realistic and try to write correctly.
